name: Dungeons of the Dragons
description:
This is Dungeons of the Dragons, an in-development indie game with strong ties to the Table top RPG 'Dungeons and Dragons'

It is currently in Pre-Alpha 0.3 (development began on 14/6/2021) and will frequently be updated

It currently contains a Pause, and Main Menu screen, and a Player plus a scrolling TileMap featuring Grass, a Path, and a small body of water. (Please note there is an invisible World Border)

---------------------------------------- 0.02 ----------------------------------------------------

Added Enemies, and combat

---------------------------------------- 0.03 ----------------------------------------------------

Added an NPC, a Village, and the first boss and quest
